Package com.ushahidi.java.sdk.api.tasks

This package contains the classes that invoke the Ushahidi API calls and returns the model classes representing the various resources available through the API invokation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseTask  
    CategoriesAdminTask
    Administrative tasks on categories
    CategoriesTask
    Implements all tasks related to Categories.
    CommentsTask
    Implements all tasks related to comments.
    CountriesTask
    Implements all tasks related to countries.
    IncidentsTask
    The ReportsTask implements all the task related to Reports task.
    LocationTask
    The Location Task Implements all tasks related to the Location API.
    ReportsAdminTask  
    ReportTask  
    SystemTask
    The system info task
    TagNewsTask
    Implements all task related to tagging an existing report with news item
    TagVideoTask
    Implements all task related to tagging an existing report with news item
    UshahidiApiTaskFactory
    A factory for creating Ushahidi API task objects.

Package com.ushahidi.java.sdk.api.tasks Description

This package contains the classes that invoke the Ushahidi API calls and returns the model classes representing the various resources available through the API invokation.
